title: Create BackfillParticipantProfilesProcessor
description: Create BullMQ processor to handle backfilling of participant profiles with batch processing and rate limit respect
dod: Process method fetches conversations with missing profiles (batch of 10)
For each conversation: fetch profile via InstagramApiService.getUserProfileById
Update conversation with profile data via repository
Implements retry logic: 3 attempts with exponential backoff
Logs completion statistics (success count, errors, duration)
